alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Lakeshore (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 18 at 3:28PM EDT until March 19 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Ohio, Ashtabula Lakeshore county. In Pennsylvania, Northern Erie county. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Maximum snowfall rates are expected to reach 1 inch per hour after sunset through early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
